        include-in-header:
            - text: |
                <style>
                    .item-list {
                        display: flex;
                        flex-wrap: wrap;
                        justify-content: space-between;
                    }

                    .item {
                        width: calc(25% - 10px); /* 25% width for each item with some spacing */
                        margin: 5px;
                        text-align: center;
                        background-color: #f0f0f0;
                        padding: 10px;
                        border: 1px solid #ccc;
                    }
                </style>

---

```{python}
#| echo: false
#| output: asis
#| label: lectures

print("<div class='item-list'>")
for i in range(1,30):
    print(f"<div class='item'>[Lecture {i:2}](./lecture-{i:02}.html)"+"{target='_blank'}</div>")
print("</div>")
```
